# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_DETONATION_MODE

## Summary
Enables/disables vehicle detonation mode

## Parameters
* **BOOL** inVehicleCombatMode

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Does nothing. It's a nullsub.
